name: Disc Doom
description:
We woke up in a scary world with no memories. We act without consciousness and face creatures from the underworld to get out of this terrible situation.

Developed among friends from Venezuela and Spain.

Pakata Games:

Fernando Álvarez (Spain) - Programming.
Erick Subero (Vzla) - Programming.
Miguel Giménez (Vzla) - Art.

I hope you enjoy it and that you can send us criticisms, suggestions and insults hahaha.
